mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.status, t.catalogID "catalogID", t.name "name", t.introduce "introduce", t.price "price", t.nowPrice "nowprice", t.picture "picture", DATE_FORMAT(t.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') "createtime", t.isnew "isnew", t.sale "sale", t.hit "hit", t.stock,t.sellcount from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and activityID is null and t.id in (select al.productID from t_attribute_link al where al.attrID=#{attrID}) and catalogID in #{item} and id=#{id} and t.name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) order by hit desc and isnew='y' and sale='y' order by id desc order by hit desc order by price desc order by createtime desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and activityID is null and t.id in (select al.productID from t_attribute_link al where al.attrID=#{attrID}) and catalogID in #{item} and id=#{id} and t.name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) order by hit desc and isnew='y' and sale='y'
select t.id, t.name from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and t.id in #{item}

select t.id "id", t.status, t.catalogID "catalogID", t.name "name", t.introduce "introduce", t.price "price", t.nowPrice "nowprice", t.picture "picture", DATE_FORMAT(t.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') "createtime", t.isnew "isnew", t.sale "sale", t.hit "hit", t.stock,t.sellcount, t.activityID from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and activityID is not null and t.id in #{item}
select t.id,t.name from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and t.catalogID in #{item} order by sellcount desc limit 0,#{top}

select t.id "id", t.catalogID "catalogID", t.name "name", t.introduce "introduce", t.price "price", t.nowPrice "nowprice", t.picture "picture", DATE_FORMAT(t.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') "createtime", t.isnew "isnew", t.sale "sale", t.hit "hit", t.stock,t.sellcount from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and catalogID in #{item} and id=#{id} and t.name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' ) and isnew=#{isnew} and sale=#{sale} order by sellcount desc order by id desc limit 0,#{top}

select t.id "id", t.catalogID "catalogID", t.name "name", t.price "price", t.nowPrice "nowprice", t.picture "picture", t.isnew "isnew", t.sale "sale", t.hit "hit", t.stock,t.sellcount from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and catalogID=#{catalogID} and catalogID in #{item} limit 0,#{top}
select t.id,t.stock,t.activityID,score from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and id=#{id}
select t.id,t.stock,t.name,t.nowPrice,t.picture from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and id in #{item}
select t.id,t.productHTML from t_product t where 1=1 and status=2 and t.productHTML is not null and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_product set id=#{id} ,catalogID=#{catalogID} ,name=#{name} ,introduce=#{introduce} ,price=#{price} ,nowPrice=#{nowPrice} ,picture=#{picture} ,maxPicture=#{maxPicture} ,productHTML=#{productHTML} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,isnew=#{isnew} ,sale=#{sale} ,hit=#{hit} ,status=#{status} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
update t_product set stock=#{stock},sellcount=#{addSellcount}+sellcount where 1=1 and id=#{id}
update t_product set hit=hit+1 where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_product t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and catalogID=#{catalogID} and t.name like CONCAT('%','${name}','%' )
SELECT a.name,al.value FROM t_attribute a,t_attribute_link al where a.id=al.attrID and al.productID=#{id} and al.value is not null
